record.id: field.name="calculations" and file.name="formatctrl" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: calculations
record.file.name: formatctrl

brief.brief: Service Manager performs these calculations on the currently available variables or fields from the primary file, or additional files already accessed.
If the Format Control record is used with reports, Service Manager performs these calculations every time it accesses the form.
If the Format Control record is on a detail form, Service Manager performs these calculations on every record.
If the Format Control record is on a header form, Service Manager performs these calculations on every page.
